text: Faustino Dettler (born 11 June 1998) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward for Patronato. ==Career== Dettler started off in the youth set-up of Patronato. He was moved into the club's senior squad in March 2019, initially appearing as an unused substitute for a Copa Argentina win over Dock Sud on 13 March. He made his professional bow on 30 March in the Primera División against Godoy Cruz, coming off the bench on sixty-two minutes before scoring one minute later with his first touch; though Patronato went on to lose 2–1. ==Career statistics== . {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|Patronato |2018–19 |rowspan="1"|Primera División |1||1||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||1||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !1!!1!!0!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!0!!0!!1!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Paraná, Entre Ríos Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Club Atlético Patronato footballers
